topic.title: Barriers To Patient Care - conformance rules

lines.i: Kinds of circumstances limiting provision of care

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.83"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10435)/@code="67515-7" Barriers to patient care NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10436)

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10437), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet BarrierToCare 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.85 STATIC (CONF:10438)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.01
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10435)/@code="67515-7" Barriers to patient care NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10436)

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10437), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet BarrierToCare 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.85 STATIC (CONF:10438)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.01
